item.title: Spring 2004. Dmitry Kabalevsky
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Spring 2004, to the 100th anniversary of the Soviet composer Dmitry Kabalevsky, the Ministry of Press and Information of the Russian Federation and the Russian...
item.content:encoded: Spring 2004, to the 100th anniversary of the Soviet composer Dmitry Kabalevsky, the Ministry of Press and Information of the Russian Federation and the Russian State Music Center released the CD “Dmitry Kabalevsky – music for front”, which included songs orchestrated by Aslan.

item.title: 2004. Sergei Penkin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: 2002-2004. Work with Sergei Penkin. The result was the concert program “Feelings”. In 2005, on the basis of this program was released DVD “Feelings”
item.content:encoded: 2002-2004. Work with Sergei Penkin. The result was the concert program “Feelings”. In 2005, on the basis of this program was released DVD “Feelings”
